programme.title: Lone Wolf and Cub
programme.sub-title: Lone Wolf and Cub The Final: Episode 2
programme.desc: Itto and his son were walking down a street when suddenly they were hit by a pumice stone. Ittou, however, does not turn around and takes the pumice stone on his back. Ittou does not turn around when two or three more pumice stones come flying at him. The man who threw the stones, Wakita, picked up a stone that had fallen by the roadside and threw it. Wakita was convinced that Itto was the skilled warrior he was looking for and wished for an assassin request.
